title: (x) Ingenta Connect logo - Verdana, Gill Sans {Bart Hakvoort}
content:

 [‹ In search of 'friendly' but well resolved Pictograms](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021045839/http:/typophile.com/node/31926 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) slanted race style square sans caps "Team" - Mania Ext Obl {Ivan Philipov (via abstractfonts.com)} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021045839/http:/typophile.com/node/31591 "Go to next forum topic")
author: drmns

comments.content: Looks like a weird combination of 2 fonts. “ingenta” appears to be Verdana, except for the “g” which is from Gill Sans. “connect” is in Gill Sans italic.
